search.title: Search
search.search_field_subtext: Enter keywords, #hashtags or @mentions in the search field to get some results.
search.found_nothing: We found nothing matching the given terms

search_tips.heading: Search Tips
search_tips.tip_1: Be careful of wrong syntax or misspelled words

followings.title: People %user% follows on Ferman
followings.no_users: There are no users followed by %user%

delete_dialog.title: Are you sure?
delete_dialog.text: Clicking "Delete" button, all likes and comments of this post will be deleted. Any further action will not be able to be undone.

delete_dialog.title: Are you sure?
delete_dialog.text: Clicking "Delete" button, all replies of this comment will be deleted. Any further action, will not be able to be undone.

posts.title: Explore new posts
posts.no_posts: I'm sad to report you that there are no posts.

users.title: Explore users
users.no_users_location: There are no users matching this location

my_account.title: My Account
my_account.gravatar_info: Ferman uses gravatar for avatars. Learn more about gravatar @here@.
my_account.private_info_subtext: These information are not visible in the public.
my_account.delete_account_subtext: This will completely remove your account and anything that's associated with it (posts, comments, likes, follows, etc). Be careful with this, any action cannot be undone. Deleting your account requires your password.

404_page.title: Page not found
404_page.heading: Page not found
404_page.subtext:
The page you're trying to reach, doesn't exist.
You've been redirected somewhere safe.

503_page.title: Access Denied
503_page.heading: Access Denied
503_page.subtext:
You are not allowed to access this content.
You've been redirected somewhere safe.
